overview: From 2025-03-30 to 2025-04-06, elizaos/eliza had 70 new PRs (67 merged), 15 new issues, and 41 active contributors.

completedItems.title: fix: twitter interaction
completedItems.body:
related: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/4181

This PR eliminates the duplicate fetchSearchTweets call previously used to retrieve Twitter interactions (likes, retweets, quotes). Instead, it reuses the already-fetched mentionCandi

completedItems.title: chore: use camelCase on plugin export (local-ai)
chore: remove import logic from core
completedItems.body:
1. plugin import logic is already handled in cli's `start` command
2. runtime is init again when there are changes to agent
so this code is redundant (also it wouldnt be able to add plugins that are not locally available)

## Issue

## Root Cause
The `getWorld` method inside `createWorld` wasn't supposed to be merged. This co

completedItems.title: docs: fix typo in Thai text for file path
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

I noticed a typo in the Thai text, where "ไฟลได้ที่" was used, which isn't the standard way to write it. It should be "ไฟล์ที่ได้" to be grammatically correct. This update corrects that typo.

p.s. i'm native

completedItems.title: chore: Fix missing comma in section headers list
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

Noticed a missing comma in the `section_headers` list, which caused the last regex pattern to be concatenated incorrectly. This could lead to `New Contributors` headers not being processed as expected.  

Fixed

completedItems.title: chore: removed duplicate JSON import
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

I noticed that the `json` module is imported twice in the code.
I removed the second import to clean up the code and improve readability.
